name: The Hair-Raising Adventures of Mr. Hair
overview: Race across trackless voids to unknown and countless worlds where you will enter into the heart of darkness. You will face many foul monstrosities, crazy creatures and aliens from a thousand worlds. Your destiny relies upon you not being swallowed by the belly of the beast and escaping to freedom! Unfortunately your path will not be an easy one, being blocked by cunning powerful forces beyond your imagination. His Fate Lies in Your Hands! Welcome to the Hair-Raising Adventures of MR HAIR
